g.text: Update max incentivization programs per product
Update the owner of the Product Provider
Update the treasury address of the Product Provider
Check the price & update phase if applicable
Redeem funds from the vault (no transfer)
Market Operator or Insurer can re-capitalize insolvent market
This can be called by anyone
This contract is used to create new markets
Market Coordinator can either be an EOA (Market Operator)
ChainlinkFeedOracle is only used when Chainlink Feed Registry is not available.
According to Sherlock Audit 08.30 L-10: This is supposed to be called
by the ProtocolTreasury or respective ProductTreasury addressses.
Keeper triggers the settlement if there were no state changes in a long time
What if there are two notes
